publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7952 Pauline McNeill: Welcome to the Glasgow Film Festivalâ€”That the Parliament celebrates Glasgow Film Festival, the fastest growing film event in the United Kingdom; considers that the festival has gone from strength to strength every year since it started in 2005, and welcomes the screening of films from across the globe and the wealth of talent expected to arrive in the city along with the festival. Supported by: Trish Godman*
S3M-7952 Welcome to the Glasgow Film Festival (lodged on 16 February 2011) Jack McConnell*
S3M-7952 Welcome to the Glasgow Film Festival (lodged on 16 February 2011) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-7952 Welcome to the Glasgow Film Festival (lodged on 16 February 2011) Linda Fabiani*
